roleset.name: backpack
roleset.note: BACKPACK-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin (from backpack.01-v)

example.name: backpack-v: from Google
example.text: In eight days, we backpacked to a base camp near the Arrigetch Peaks, and explored three of the surrounding valleys.
example.arg: to a base camp near the Arrigetch Peaks

example.name: backpack-v
example.text: They backpacked through the country as well as hiked the 7,972 feet to the top of Machu Picchu

example.name: backpack-v
example.text: They backpacked from Mexico to Canada on the Pacific Crest Trail.
